Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'Friends'?
Questions.Explanation: Joey is a spin-off of the popular TV show 'Friends', focusing on the character Joey Tribbiani.

Questions.Question: What is the spin-off of 'Breaking Bad'?
Questions.Explanation: Better Call Saul is the spin-off of 'Breaking Bad', following the character Saul Goodman.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'The Vampire Diaries'?
Questions.Explanation: The Originals is a spin-off of 'The Vampire Diaries', focusing on the Mikaelson family.

Questions.Question: What is the spin-off of 'Grey's Anatomy'?
Questions.Explanation: Private Practice is the spin-off of 'Grey's Anatomy', centered around Dr. Addison Montgomery.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'The Office'?
Questions.Explanation: Parks and Recreation is a spin-off of 'The Office', featuring the character Leslie Knope.

Questions.Question: What is the spin-off of 'Buffy the Vampire Slayer'?
Questions.Explanation: Angel is the spin-off of 'Buffy the Vampire Slayer', focusing on the character Angel.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'NCIS'?
Questions.Explanation: NCIS: Los Angeles is a spin-off of 'NCIS', set in the Office of Special Projects.

Questions.Question: What is the spin-off of 'The X-Files'?
Questions.Explanation: The Lone Gunmen is the spin-off of 'The X-Files', featuring the characters Byers, Frohike, and Langly.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'Law & Order'?
Questions.Explanation: Law & Order: SVU is a spin-off of 'Law & Order', focusing on the Special Victims Unit.

Questions.Question: What is the spin-off of 'The Walking Dead'?
Questions.Explanation: Fear the Walking Dead is the spin-off of 'The Walking Dead', set in a different location.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'M*A*S*H'?
Questions.Explanation: AfterMASH is a spin-off of 'M*A*S*H', following the lives of characters after the Korean War.

Questions.Question: What is the spin-off of 'CSI: Crime Scene Investigation'?
Questions.Explanation: CSI: Miami is the spin-off of 'CSI: Crime Scene Investigation', set in Miami, Florida.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'Supernatural'?
Questions.Explanation: Wayward Sisters is a spin-off of 'Supernatural', focusing on a group of female hunters.

Questions.Question: What is the spin-off of 'Game of Thrones'?
Questions.Explanation: House of the Dragon is the upcoming spin-off of 'Game of Thrones', set in the Targaryen dynasty.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'Cheers'?
Questions.Explanation: Frasier is a spin-off of 'Cheers', following the character Dr. Frasier Crane.

Questions.Question: What is the spin-off of 'Criminal Minds'?
Questions.Explanation: Criminal Minds: Beyond Borders is the spin-off of 'Criminal Minds', focusing on international cases.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'Happy Days'?
Questions.Explanation: Laverne & Shirley is a spin-off of 'Happy Days', featuring the characters Laverne DeFazio and Shirley Feeney.

Questions.Question: What is the spin-off of 'Star Trek: The Next Generation'?
Questions.Explanation: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine is the spin-off of 'Star Trek: The Next Generation', set on a space station.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'All in the Family'?
Questions.Explanation: The Jeffersons is a spin-off of 'All in the Family', focusing on the character George Jefferson.

Questions.Question: What is the spin-off of 'Doctor Who'?
Questions.Explanation: Torchwood is the spin-off of 'Doctor Who', following the adventures of Captain Jack Harkness.
